scripts.shebang: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/index.js > temp && mv temp dist/index.js && chmod +x dist/index.js
scripts.deploy:patch: yarn build && yarn shebang && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.deploy:minor: yarn build && yarn shebang && npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.deploy:major: yarn build && yarn shebang && npm version major && npm publish --access public
